field_speakers.processed: All speakers and a schedule can be found here, https://digitalorientalist.com/infrastructures-schedule/

field_organizers.processed: The Digital Orientalist announces its 2022 conferences, all online. The Conference is open to everybody, but registration is necessary.

field_description.processed: This year the focus of the virtual conference will be “Infrastructures” in the context of digital humanities in the study of Asia, Africa, and the Middle East. We invite papers to discuss how digital humanities research and data are organized, stored and shared; what are the considerations behind starting and coordinating DH projects; and what could institutions do to accommodate such projects.
